subject: Basketball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Stars of the last six decades were on hand for the inaugural Knicks Legends Awards, but the Knicks of this decade faltered down the stretch and lost to the Orlando Magic.
snippet: Stars of the last six decades were on hand for the inaugural Knicks Legends Awards, but the Knicks of this decade faltered down the stretch and lost to the Orlando Magic.
